topics.body:
I logic that a character can survive a massive explosion unscathed
I don't have an issue with it

The part that gets me is when their clothes are also perfectly fine
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551f2c936368721515880400#post_551f2c936368721515880400
Anime Logic.

*Big Explosion*

>Cloth are slightly torn

*Power up*

>Shirt gets ripped off but pants are completely fine

And some times Either or happens. 

I want to see more Anime's where the main character gets hit by a Nuc like Explosion and he's ok but he is COMPLETELY Naked and the whole fight is with him without cloth because of it!
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
